text.apotheosis.world_tier.frontier.desc: Venture forth into the dangerous world
text.apotheosis.world_tier.summit.desc: You've reached the top, but not the end
text.apotheosis.world_tier.pinnacle.desc: Lose thyself in the mountain's stormy peaks
button.apotheosis.already_activated: This World Tier is currently active
button.apotheosis.show_detailed_info.des: View Mob Buffs, Player Buffs, and Rarities
button.apotheosis.return.desc: Go back to the Tier Select screen
tutorial.apotheosis.world_tier.introduct: Welcome to the tutorial for Apothic World Tiers! In this tutorial, you will learn about the new World Tier system, and how to progress through it. Click "Next" to continue, or click "Skip Tutorial" to skip this tutorial.
tutorial.apotheosis.world_tier.world_tie:
World Tiers are the progression system for Apotheosis. Unlocking and activating new World Tiers will raise the difficulty of the game, but also increase the quality of loot that you find in the world.

Hover over a World Tier's icon to see the unlock requirements, and click it to focus an unlocked one.
tutorial.apotheosis.world_tier.tier_name: This is the name of the selected World Tier, as well as a short description of the tier.
tutorial.apotheosis.world_tier.tier_diff:
This is the difficulty of the selected World Tier. Higher difficulties mean stronger mobs, but also better rewards.

At World Tier: Frontier and above, Apothic Invaders will begin to spawn in your world.
tutorial.apotheosis.world_tier.detailed_:
This button will show you detailed information about the World Tier, including the buffs and debuffs for both players and mobs, as well as the drop chances for each rarity and gem purity.

If you aren't sure what Rarities or Purities are, see the Chronicle of Shadows (the in-game guidebook).
This button allows you to activate the selected world tier, if it is not already active.

Clicking "Done" will automatically activate World Tier: Haven. For all other World Tiers, you need to return here and activate them yourself.
text.apotheosis.world_tier_tutorial: This item has an unknown power
text.apotheosis.world_tier_tutorial.2: Press %s and activate World Tier: Haven to unlock it
affix.apotheosis:ranged/spectral.desc: You have a %s%% chance to shoot a second arrow.
affix.apotheosis:melee/festive.desc: Slain enemies have a %s%% chance to be a Loot Piñata
affix.apotheosis:melee/thunderstruck.des: Your attacks deal %s damage to nearby enemies.
affix.apotheosis:shield/retreating.desc: You will leap back when blocking in melee.
affix.apotheosis:generic/telepathic.desc: Mob drops will teleport to you.
Block drops will teleport to you.
affix.apotheosis:melee/executing.desc: Enemies below %s%% max health will be executed.
affix.apotheosis:melee/cleaving.desc: Attacks have a %s%% chance to also hit up to %s nearby enemies.
affix.apotheosis:breaker/ability/enlight: This tool can place a torch at the cost of %s durability.
affix.apotheosis:shield/psychic.desc: Blocking a projectile deals %s%% of the damage to the shooter.
affix.apotheosis:shield/catalyzing.desc: Blocking an explosion will grant you great strength.
affix.apotheosis:breaker/effect/radial.d: This tool breaks in a %sx%s area.
affix.apotheosis:breaker/ability/superma: This tool breaks in a %sx%s area.
This tool has %s effectiveness against all blocks.
affix.apotheosis:breaker/ability/stonefo: Natural stones may be converted between eachother
affix.apotheosis:breaker/ability/sandfor: Sand and similar blocks may be converted between eachother
affix.apotheosis.stoneforming.desc: Breaking [%s] converts it to %s, shift-right click to select a target.
affix.apotheosis:shears/effect/leafformi: Leaves may be converted between eachother
affix.apotheosis:shears/effect/gardening: Flowers may be converted between eachother
affix.apotheosis:durable.desc: This item ignores %s%% of durability damage.
info.apotheosis.socketing:
Gems can be socketed with a Smithing Table. Item on the left, gem on the right.

Choose wisely, as removing a socketed gem is costly.
bonus.apotheosis:bloody_arrow.desc: When firing, you lose %s%% Max Health and deal %s%% damage. %s
bonus.apotheosis:leech_block.desc: Blocking an attack heals you for %s%% of the damage. %s
gem.apotheosis:overworld/royalty.bonus.p: Breaking Copper Ore has a %s%% chance to drop Raw Gold instead.
bonus.apotheosis:mageslayer.desc: Ignore %s%% of magic damage and heal for the same amount.
bonus.apotheosis:twilight_ore_magnet.des: Can be used as an Ore Magnet, costing an extra %s durability.
bonus.apotheosis:twilight_treasure_gobli: Attacking an entity has a %s%% chance to summon a Treasure Goblin. %s
Taking damage has a %s%% chance to fortify you with Twilight Shields. %s
bonus.apotheosis:frozen_drops.desc: Killing an enemy with %s increases loot drops by %s%%.
item.apotheosis.gem.apotheosis:the_nethe: Gem of the Ravenous Blood Lord
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_socketing.desc: Adds one socket to an item
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_withdrawal.desc: Removes all socketed gems from an item
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_rebirth.desc: Used to fuel the Reforging Table
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_enhancement.des: Used to fuel the Augmenting Table
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_unnaming.desc: Removes the affixed name from an item
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_malice.desc: Applies Touch of Malice to an Affix Item
item.apotheosis.iron_upgrade_smithing_te: Add chain armor or stone equipment
item.apotheosis.gold_upgrade_smithing_te: Add iron armor, weapon, or tools
item.apotheosis.diamond_upgrade_smithing: Add golden armor, weapon, or tools
block.apotheosis.gem_cutting_table.desc: Uses Gem Dust and Rarity Materials to upgrade Gems
block.apotheosis.salvaging_table.desc: Breaks down Affix Items into Rarity Materials
block.apotheosis.reforging_table.desc: Uses Sigils of Rebirth and Rarity Materials to reforge items
block.apotheosis.augmenting_table.desc: Uses Sigils of Enhancement to augment individual affixes
text.apotheosis.gems_returned: Gems will be returned to your inventory
text.apotheosis.malice_marker: Malice will be applied on craft
info.apotheosis.gem_crushing:
Your first Gem Dust is obtained by dropping any Apothic Gem into the world, and making an Anvil block fall on it.

After that, use the Salvaging Table.
info.apotheosis.gem_extraction:
Used in a Smithing Table to unsocket Apothic Gems.

The item will be destroyed in the process.
info.apotheosis.gem_expulsion:
Used in a Smithing Table to unsocket Apothic Gems.

The gems will be destroyed in the process.
info.apotheosis.unnaming: Used in a Smithing Table to remove the affix components from an item's name.
info.apotheosis.salvaging: Rarity Materials are obtained by salvaging Affix Items in a Salvaging Table.
advancements.apotheosis.progression.root:
Milestones for unlocking World Tiers in Apotheosis.
Press CTRL+T to open the select screen
advancements.apotheosis.progression.have: Haven is unlocked when you find your first affix item and is activated by default.
advancements.apotheosis.progression.fron:
Equip a full set of Affix items to progress into the Frontier.
Once unlocked, use CTRL+T to activate it.
advancements.apotheosis.progression.asce: Equip a full set of Uncommon gear and slay an Invader to begin your Ascent
advancements.apotheosis.progression.summ: To reach the Summit, slay the Wither, and equip a full set of Rare gear
advancements.apotheosis.progression.pinn: Entering the Pinnacle requires freeing the End, and acquiring a full set of Epic gear
advancements.apotheosis.affix.desc: Find an item with an Apothic Affix.
advancements.apotheosis.boss.desc: Slay an Apothic Boss, and retrieve their affix item.
advancements.apotheosis.chests.desc: Find an affix item in a chest.
advancements.apotheosis.merchant.desc: Purchase an affix item from the wandering trader.
advancements.apotheosis.random.desc: Retrieve an affix item from a random monster.
advancements.apotheosis.gem.desc: Find a Apothic Gem, which can be socketed into Affix Items.
advancements.apotheosis.ancient_gem.desc: Using the Gem Cutting Table, create a Perfect Gemstone.
advancements.apotheosis.socket.desc: Using a Smithing Table, socket a Gem into an item.
advancements.apotheosis.gem_cut.desc: Use the Gem Cutting Table to upgrade an Apothic Gem.
advancements.apotheosis.spawner.root.des: Spawners can be collected and modified, see JEI for info.
advancements.apotheosis.spawner.desc: Collect a mob spawner using Silk Touch.
advancements.apotheosis.capturing.desc: Get a spawn egg from a mob using the Capturing enchantment
advancements.apotheosis.modifier.desc: Use a spawner modifier to change the stats of a spawner.
advancements.apotheosis.spawncount: Look at the Size of His Spawner!
advancements.apotheosis.spawncount.desc: Raise the spawn count of a spawner to 16
advancements.apotheosis.maxdelay.desc: Decrease the maximum spawn delay of a spawner to 20
advancements.apotheosis.mindelay.desc: Decrease the minimum spawn delay of a spawner to 20
advancements.apotheosis.nearbyents.desc: Raise the max nearby entities of a spawner to 32
advancements.apotheosis.playerrange.desc: Raise the player activation range of a spawner to 48
advancements.apotheosis.spawnrange.desc: Raise the spawn range of a spawner to 32
advancements.apotheosis.conditions.desc: Disable spawn conditions for a spawner
advancements.apotheosis.players.desc: Disable the need for nearby players for a spawner
advancements.apotheosis.redstone.desc: Enable redstone control for a spawner
advancements.apotheosis.light.desc: Make your spawner work in any light level.
advancements.apotheosis.noai.desc: Disable Mob AI for a spawner.
advancements.apotheosis.ultimate_spawner: Create a spawner with minimal delays that has redstone control, no AI, ignores spawn conditions, and ignores players.
item.apotheosis.potion_charm.desc: Applies %s when active and in the inventory.
item.apotheosis.potion_charm.curios_only: Only works in a Curios slot
misc.apotheosis.blacklisted_potion: Cannot be converted into a Potion Charm.
info.apotheosis.ender_lead: The Ender Lead is an item that can be used to move animals around.  Punch an animal to capture, and right click to release it.  The leash will not work on other types of entities.
message.apotheosis.item_linking_disabled: Item Linking has been disabled by the server.
book.apotheosis.name: Chronicle of Shadows
book.apotheosis.subtitle: Guide to Apotheosis
book.apotheosis.landing: Welcome to the world of Apotheosis.$(br2)Apotheosis is organized into $(#8080FF)Modules$(), and so is the content of this book.$(br2)Disabled modules are hidden.
